participant_1.background:
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format.
I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life.
i wish my boyfriend didn t want an open relationship.
I like to take my time driving through the countryside and listening to music.

participant_2.background:
I try new things to keep myself young.
I picked up my guitar and started playing.
i have a strange obsession with pens.
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing?
I'm great! My boyfriend and I went hiking yesterday.
That sounds amazing! I love hiking. Where did you go?
We went to a local trail in the mountains. It was beautiful.
That sounds amazing. I would love to see the mountains.
You should come visit! We would love to have you.
I would love that. I'm free next weekend if you are.
That sounds great! We'll make a plan.
Awesome! I'm looking forward to it.
Me too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks, play guitar, and spend time with my family.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies. I like to run, skateboard, and listen to music.
Oh wow! I love vinyl records! What kind of music do you listen to?
I listen to a lot of different types of music. I really like indie rock, folk, and classical.
That's awesome! I love indie rock too. I also like a lot of oldies music.
I love oldies music too! My favorite band is The Beatles.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands as well.
Oh wow! We have a lot in common. I'm glad we met.
Me too! I'm glad we're friends.
